last_episode_to_air.name: The One That Got Away
last_episode_to_air.overview: In Paris, Christine plays cupid for Kevin and his ex-girlfriend Devon. Kane reflects on big career moves and Kevin celebrates six years of sobriety.

name: Bling Empire
overview: Follow LA's wildly wealthy Asian and Asian American fun seekers as they go all out with fabulous parties, glamour and drama in this reality series.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Unfinished business and big opportunities stir up tension in the group, but nothing will stop them from living their flashiest and most fabulous lives.

episodes.name: Necklacegate 90210
episodes.overview: Meet LA's Asian socialites. Chinatown comes to Beverly Hills, just for Christine. Anna jets Kelly to Paris for her birthday, then sends a message.

episodes.name: Tale of Two Trusts
episodes.overview: Ill will lingers as Christine faces Anna, who shows her hand — and more — to Kevin while playing matchmaker. Family pressure looms for the Chius.

episodes.name: What's in Anna's Shower?
episodes.overview: Cherie welcomes her baby while still expecting a proposal. Kim and Anna clash after a raunchy discovery. Kelly throws a party — who threw the drink?

episodes.name: Beverly Hills Heartbreak
episodes.overview: Kim strikes out at Kane's bowling bash. Christine confronts Gabe. Kevin explores his origins. Andrew hurls accusations, and Kelly makes her move.

episodes.name: Private Lies
episodes.overview: It's birthdays and Botox as Kevin strips and Christine impresses. Kim hunts for her dad. Kelly and Kevin step out, but can she resist Andrew's lead?

episodes.name: The Other Side
episodes.overview: Kelly plays with fire — and Andrew. Medium Tyler Henry helps Cherie find closure. Blocked in both love and life, Kevin breaks down during hypnosis.

episodes.name: Kevin and Kane Take Charleston
episodes.overview: Tired of the judgement, Kelly dodges rumors. Kim worries about reconnecting with her father, so Kevin and Kane embark on an excellent adventure.

episodes.name: Will You Marry Me?
episodes.overview: Kevin breaks the heartrending news to Kim. "E is for Hermès" as the friends shop the feelings away in Vegas. Cherie shocks everybody.

episodes.name: Diamonds And Deception
episodes.overview: Shoes off: Kevin reveals his digs and reconnects with Kim. Kane broadcasts Kelly's status. Have Anna and Christine made up? Jessey's history emerges.

episodes.name: Rumor Has It
episodes.overview: A groggy Kane dives into the sex talk. A date nose-dives, a secret drops, and Kim makes a confession. Cherie meets famed stylist Nicola Formichetti.

episodes.name: Adieu ma Chérie
episodes.overview: Emotions run high over truffles and dim sum as Kim and Kevin spar and gossip spreads. Dorothy dishes with Jaime about dating — and bad blood with Kane.

episodes.name: No Friend Zone
episodes.overview: Unable to find a resolution, Kane airs his issues. Kevin and Kim road test a budding relationship. Kelly breaks down and grabs some rays.

episodes.name: From Glowup to Blowup
episodes.overview: What's real? Christine looks for Baby G's new pet and discusses her fears. Kim and Kevin wing it, but Kane shoots down all hope. Time for a showdown.

episodes.name: Royalty Over Loyalty
episodes.overview: A blowup at Kane's blowout spirals into the store and fuels rumors. Has the bro code been broken forever? Actor Lewis Tan reaches out to Jaime.

episodes.name: The Truth Hurts
episodes.overview: A feng shui expert visits Kane's home. Kevin cooks up some romance, but Kim calls for a lie detector. On Father's Day, Christine weighs surrogates.

episodes.name: Battle Royale
episodes.overview: The truth hurts: Kevin faces the facts about love and career. Dorothy makes a move to NYC. Kane confronts Christine, who goes head-to-head with Anna.

episodes.name: Blast From the Past
episodes.overview: Andrew tries to make amends with Anna, causing trouble for Kelly at Guy's anniversary party. Jaime's lunch with Christine gets heated.

episodes.name: Gossip Guy
episodes.overview: Kelly is pleasantly surprised by a first date over spicy ramen. Christine and Gabe lose their cool at a birthday party for Mimi's son Skyler.

episodes.name: Envy, Intrigue, and Escapes
episodes.overview: Kevin doesn't react well to Kane's news about working with Fenty. Kelly gets a surprise during an impromptu trip to Mexico. Kim makes peace with Anna.

episodes.name: Making Up in Malibu
episodes.overview: A call from "Dancing With the Stars" cheers Christine up after painful news. Kelly brings Kevin, Kim and Kane to Malibu to work through some issues.

episodes.name: There's Something About Janice
episodes.overview: Reiki healer Janice helps Kevin, Kelly, Kane and Kim communicate — and catches Kevin's eye. Christine strikes edgy poses for photographer Tyler Shields.

episodes.name: Achy Reiki Heart
episodes.overview: Kane opens up about his insecurities. Kelly invites her mom to Mimi's birthday party in San Francisco, hoping they'll grow closer. Kevin goes on a date.

episodes.name: Crash and Burn
episodes.overview: Christine airs old grievances. Kevin hits a bump in the road and has an emotional meeting with his cousin. A girls trip to Joshua Tree turns tense.

episodes.name: The Truth About Kim
episodes.overview: Kevin and Kelly compete to pitch Don and Mimi on their booze-free beverages. Kim brings a hot date — and some brutal honesty — to Kane's party.

episodes.name: Kevin in Paris
episodes.overview: Christine and Kevin travel in style to Paris Fashion Week, where Kevin is wowed by the high life and Christine has an awkward run-in with Jaime.

episodes.name: The One That Got Away
episodes.overview: In Paris, Christine plays cupid for Kevin and his ex-girlfriend Devon. Kane reflects on big career moves and Kevin celebrates six years of sobriety.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Unfinished business and big opportunities stir up tension in the group, but nothing will stop them from living their flashiest and most fabulous lives.
